utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you guys doing up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, we wanted to finish the crossword before we went to bed. Hey, do you know a six-letter word for red?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dark red.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I think that's wrong, but there's a Connect the Dots in here for you later. Hey, how about maroon?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, you are so smart!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aww, you guys are so cute!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I'll see you in the morning.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Dream Monica
utterance.content: Y'know, I love doing crossword puzzles with you honey!

utterance.speaker: Dream Joey
utterance.content: Aww, me too. Now let's finish this and go to bed.

utterance.speaker: Dream Monica
utterance.content: Okay! There's only one left, three letter word, not dog but…

utterance.speaker: Dream Joey
utterance.content: Cat.

utterance.speaker: Dream Monica
utterance.content: Yes! You are so smart! I love you.

utterance.speaker: Dream Joey
utterance.content: I love you too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uhh, we still need a tip.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. Hold on. I got it. Nickel! How much more do we need?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A couple of bucks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, dime! You guys should probably keep talking; this could take a while. Oh no, wait! Look it! Whoa! Oh my God, this is a police badge!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that's so cool! Why would a cop come in here though? They don't serve donuts. Y'know what actually, could you discover the badge again? I think I can come up with something better than that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, I bet somebody's missing that badge.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I should probably take it back. Ooh, but you know what? While I'm at the police station, I could check their Ten Most Wanted lists because my friend Fritzy has been like number 11 forever, so this could be her year!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you guys!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Joey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. That uh, that my sweatshirt?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yes, it is. I'm sorry I borrowed it, I was cold. I hope its okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well uh, it's just that uh, y'know if-if you're gonna be wearing someone's sweatshirt shouldn't it be your boyfriends--and I’m not him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I'll give it back to you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no! No! I mean it's gonna be all smelling like Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you saying I smell bad?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No, you smell like a meadow. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's with him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, y'know what? The last time Joey went to a meadow, his mother was shot by a hunter.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I still don't know. I'm sorry I just wanna make sure that I bought the right couch. I need a couch that says, "Kids welcome here." But that also says, "Come here to me!"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! You say that to kids?!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! No! The "Come here to me" is y'know for the ladies.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, honey, it's a nice couch. It's not a magic couch.

utterance.speaker: The Salesman
utterance.content: You picked a great couch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: The Salesman
utterance.content: Yeah. Could you just sign right here please?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, sure. Whoa-whoa, what's this? The delivery charge is almost as much as the couch!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait! No, that's ridiculous. Come on, he lives three blocks away!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, y'know what? I'll take it myself, thank you! All right Rach, let's go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Are you kiddin'?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, come on it's only three blocks! And-and, it's not very heavy, try it! Come on! Come on!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Oh! I can do it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: The Salesman
utterance.content: You two are really gonna enjoy that couch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah, we're uh, yeah we're not together.

utterance.speaker: The Salesman
utterance.content: Ohh, okay. Something didn't quite add up there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's that supposed to mean?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: The Salesman
utterance.content: Well you, her, I mean, she's very…y'know. And you're like…y'know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not that it's any of your business, but we did go out.

utterance.speaker: The Salesman
utterance.content: Really? You two?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on, I don't really want to be doing this right now. I am carrying a very heavy couch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then tell him quickly.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine! We went out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not only did we go out, we did it 298 times!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross!! Oh my--ugh!! You kept count?! You are such a loser!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A loser you did it with 298 times!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. Oh! Ma'am? Excuse me, ma'am?

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: Yes?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You can't put your cigarette out on a tree!

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: Yeah I can, it worked real well.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No but you shouldn't! Don't ever do that again.

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: I won't! Until I have my next cigarette.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hold it! N.Y.P.D! Freeze punk!

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah that's right you are so busted. Book 'em.

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: Who are you talking too?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Save it Red! Unless you wanna spend the night in the slammer, you apologize to the tree.

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: I am not going to apologize to a tree!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You apologize to the tree right now or I am calling for backup. Backup! Backup!!

utterance.speaker: The Smoking Woman
utterance.content: I-I'm sorry! Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, cancel backup! Cancel backup!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, didn't you say that there was an elevator in here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhh, yes I did but there isn't. Okay, here we go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, go left. Left! Left!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what? There is no more left, left!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh okay, lift it straight up over your head! Straight up over your head! You can do it! You can do it! Okay. You got it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good-good-good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, you got it right? You got it right? You got it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Any chance you think the couch looks good there?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: …so this guy was all And I'm all, Buffay, Homicide. It was just so cool!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, you were supposed to take that back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know but I'm having so much fun doing good deeds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but impersonating a police officer is a serious thing. You could get arrested.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You could get arrested, right now! All right, yeah, I gotta take it back. I'm totally drunk with power.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi, Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I didn’t know you guys were going to be here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Joey, sweetie, taste this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is going on with you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nothing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, come on! You've been acting strange all day!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! There is something. I kinda had a dream, but I don't want to talk about it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-what-what if Martin Luther King had said that? I kinda have a dream! I don’t want to talk about it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, it involved Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You had a dream about a girl that I am seeing?! Oh, that is so cool! I can't tell you how many times I've dreamt about a girl that he was seeing. Anyway we're talking about your dream. I love you. Your dream?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't worry, there wasn't any sex in it or anything. I haven't dreamt about her like that since I found out about you two--ish.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What was the dream about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, okay. You were my girlfriend and we were doing the crossword puzzle. Y'know like you guys were doing last night. So, that's it. I'm in love with Monica and I'll be moving out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait, Joey! Joey! That doesn’t mean that-that you're in love with me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It-it doesn’t?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, it can mean anything. Like uh, all of the sudden you're jealous because I've become the apartment stud.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That kinda sounds like your dream dude.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Or, it could mean that-that you saw Chandler and me together and we y'know were being close and stuff and then you just want to have that with someone too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: In the dream I did enjoy the closeness.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Um-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, look, are you attracted to Monica? Right here, right now, are you attracted to her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not really.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well there you have it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well sure! I'm just wearing sweats! But that's good that you're not in love with me, because you just want a girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I don't think it's just about just getting a girlfriend. Y'know? I mean, yeah, I can get a girlfriend! Yeah, we could sit in the chair and do crosswords, but y'know are we ever going to have y'know the closeness like-like you guys have?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well y'know, Monica and I were friends before we started dating. So maybe-maybe that's it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Friends first? That's interesting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You become friends after?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, never done that either.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, umm, do you guys have that tape measure?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, it's actually in my bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's up Joey?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How you doin'?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Excuse me, is this your car?

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well I don't think it's very nice of you to park here, y'know you're blocking the entrance.

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Don't worry about it. It's not a problem.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it's a problem for me, which means it's a problem for you 'cause I'm a cop.

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: So am I!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, no. Oh okay, so you're a cop which means you can park anywhere, 'cause I know that 'cause I'm a cop too. So, all right, keep up the good work. 10-4.

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Hey, wait a second! So wait, what precinct are you with?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I-I'm with the umm, the 57th.

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Oh, I know a guy in homicide up there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm in vice. Yeah, in fact I'm undercover right now. I'm a whore.

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Who-who else is in vice up there?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, do you know, umm Sipowicz?

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Sipowicz? No, I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, big guy, kinda bald.

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: No, I don't know him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t try to call him or anything, 'cause he's not there, he's out. His umm, his partner just died.

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Wow umm, tell Sipowicz I'm real sorry for his loss.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I-I sure will, take care.

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Hey by the way, I'm sure Sipowicz is gonna be all right. I heard that kid from Silver Spoons is really good. And where did you find my badge?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Joey, would you mind giving me and Ross a hand moving his couch?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I'd love too, but I got acting class. But y'know what? I guess I can blow that off, for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, hey, Rach let me ask you something. Uh, I was just over there talking to Monica and Chandler, boy they are really tight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah that's not such a bad situation they got going over there. I'm thinking of getting me one of those.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's up Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, the reason I think Monica and Chandler are so great…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: …is because they were friends first. Y'know? So I asked myself, "Who are my friends?" You and Phoebe, and I saw you first. So…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you saying?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm saying maybe you and I crank it up a notch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know honey, umm, as uh, as flattered as I am that uh, you saw me first, uhh, I just, I-I don't think we should be cranking anything up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'll treat you real nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, well, y'know umm… No honey, listen I think it's a great idea to become friends with someone before you date them, but I think the way you do it is y'know you meet someone, become their friend, build a foundation, then you ask them out on a date. Don't hit on your existing friends!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Won't-won't that take longer?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah. Oh, but once you find it, ohh it's so worth the wait.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. I understand. I understand. Man, I wish I saw Phoebe first!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come here to me. No-no, you come here to me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Ross! I brought reinforcements.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh great! What, you brought Joey?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I brought the next best thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler?! You brought Chandler?! The next best thing would be Monica!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, I would be offended, but Monica is freakishly strong, so…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I-I drew a sketch about how we're gonna do it. Okay Rach, that's you. That's the couch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa-oh, what's-what's that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that's me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! You certainly think a lot of yourself.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! That's-that's my arm!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I see. I thought you just really, really liked your new couch.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? Just-just follow my lead.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on, Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right. Okay, here we go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, ready?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Turn.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Turn! Turn!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I don't think we can turn anymore!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I don't, I just don't think it's going to fit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah it will! Come on, up! Up-up-up! Up! Yes! Here we go! Pivot! Pivot! Piv-ot! Piv-et!! Piv-ett!!! Piv-et!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Shut up! Shut up! Shut up!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I don't think it's going to pivot anymore.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Rachel
utterance.content: You think?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, let's uh, let's bring it back down and-and try again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, yeah, I think it's really stuck now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe that didn't work!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, me neither! I mean, you had a sketch!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, y'know, what did you mean when you said pivot?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! How's it going? Did you make any new friends?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, I met this woman.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, whoa-whoa! What's she like?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, well, she's…really good in bed.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, I thought you were gonna try to be friends first!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well look, hey, it's all your fault!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well because you didn't give me advice! No! You gave me a pickup line! As soon as I told her I wanted to y'know, build a foundation and be friends first. I suddenly, through no fault of my own, became irresistible to her! And her roommate!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What about the closeness?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Closeness-shmoshness! There was three of us for crying out loud!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Hey, who wants pizza?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh, I do! I do! I do!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, great! Can you believe I found it on the second floor?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Voice
utterance.content: N.Y.P.D!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, just a minute officer!!

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: I'm looking for Phoebe Buffay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, God, it's him! It's that cop! God, I can't believe it! He found me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, Phoebe, are you gonna go to jail?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, if I'm going down, I'm taking you with me. Harboring a fugitive? That's one to three years minimum. Good luck Chandler. Okay, you can arrest me. Fine. But you'll never make it stick and you know it!

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Yeah, but I kinda don't have a choice, it's my job. I mean, you understand right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yep! As long as you understand that I'm going to call my lawyer and once he puts you on the stand he'll make you look like a fool. A fool!

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: I don't like looking foolish. Y'know what? Maybe uh, I don't arrest you today. Maybe I came by and you weren't here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I would love it if I weren't here!

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Okay, so since umm, you're not going to jail tonight I was wondering if you would like to go to dinner with me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me?!

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Yeah. Ever since you flashed my badge at me, I kinda can't stop thinking about you. You're the prettiest, fake undercover whore I've ever seen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Joey
utterance.content: Nice!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! I didn't see that coming! You're-you're asking me out!

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Yeah. I mean, I coulda done it better, but these people keep staring at me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, yeah, I'd like to go out with you officer…

utterance.speaker: Cop
utterance.content: Gary.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Gary.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, so it's a date.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! So--ooh, I gotta ask you though. How did you know where to find me?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Well you're fingerprints were all over my badge so I just ran it through the computer and this was listed as your last known address so I just checked it out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, impressive.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Not as impressive as you. I gotta tell you, I looked at your record and you've done some pretty weird stuff.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, we'll talk at dinner.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay. So I'll come by in a couple hours and pick you up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I can't wait!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay. And don't worry, I'm not just gonna take you out for donuts.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He has a gun!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'd like to return this couch. I'm not satisfied with it.

utterance.speaker: The Saleswoman
utterance.content: You wanna return this couch? It's cut in half!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's what I'm telling you.

utterance.speaker: The Saleswoman
utterance.content: Did you cut this couch in half?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This couch, is cut in half! I would like to exchange it for one that is not cut in half!

utterance.speaker: The Saleswoman
utterance.content: You're telling me this couch was delivered to you like this?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I am a reasonable man. I will accept store credit.

utterance.speaker: The Saleswoman
utterance.content: I'll give you store credit in the amount of four dollars.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I take it.
